props.name: children
props.description: Dialog children, usually the included sub-components

props.name: disableEscapeKeyDown
props.description: If true, hitting escape will not fire the onClose callback

props.name: fullScreen
props.description: If true, the dialog will be full-screen

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the dialog stretches to maxWidth

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Determine the max-width of the dialog

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed

props.name: open
props.description: If true, the component is shown

props.name: PaperComponent
props.description: The component used to render the body of the dialog

props.name: PaperProps
props.description: Props applied to the Paper element

props.name: scroll
props.description: Determine the container for scrolling the dialog

props.name: TransitionComponent
props.description: The component used for the transition
